tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  patient_dob DATE,
  medical_condition TEXT,
  insurance_provider VARCHAR(255),
  fraudulent_claim BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE identity_theft_victims (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    dob DATE,
    address VARCHAR(100),
    medical_records TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    victim_id INT REFERENCES identity_theft_victims(id),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    insurance_provider VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE stolen_medical_records (
    record_id INT,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    medical_condition TEXT,
    insurance_provider VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_claims (
    claim_id INT,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    claim_status VARCHAR(20),
    claim_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  ssn VARCHAR(10),
  medical_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_info (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_number VARCHAR(20),
  insurance_provider VARCHAR(100),
  validity_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE fraud_history (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_number VARCHAR(15),
  description TEXT,
  date_reported DATE
)

CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  password VARCHAR(50),
  access_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
	patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_name VARCHAR(50),
	dob DATE,
	ssn VARCHAR(20),
	insurance_provider VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
	patient_id INT,
	diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
	treatment VARCHAR(100),
	doctor_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
	claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id INT,
	claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	claim_date DATE,
	approval_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE healthcare_providers (
	hcp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	hcp_name VARCHAR(50),
	hcp_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE fraud_alerts (
	alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id INT,
	alert_type VARCHAR(50),
	alert_date DATE
)
